languages.text: {n}Лицо Ардженты светлеет.{/n} "Бесчисленные враги, неудобная позиция. О Император, благодарю, что снова даешь нам шанс вкусить сладость боя и торжество подвига!"

{n}Argenta's expression brightens.{/n} "Countless foes and a cumbersome position. O Emperor, I thank Thee for giving us another chance to taste the sweetness of battle and the solemn joy of courageous deeds!"
languages.original_text: {n}Лицо Ардженты светлеет.{/n} "Бесчисленные враги, неудобная позиция. О Император, благодарю, что снова даешь нам шанс вкусить сладость боя и торжество подвига!"

{n}Argenta's expression brightens.{/n} "Countless foes and a cumbersome position. O Emperor, I thank Thee for giving us another chance to taste the sweetness of battle and the solemn joy of courageous deeds!"

{n}Argenta's expression brightens.{/n} "Countless foes and a cumbersome position. O Emperor, I thank Thee for giving us another chance to taste the sweetness of battle and the solemn joy of courageous deeds!"

languages.text: {n}El rostro de Argenta se ilumina.{/n} «Enemigos sin fin y una posición espantosa. ¡Oh, Emperador, te agradezco que nos hayas dado otra oportunidad de disfrutar del fragor de la batalla y de la solemne alegría del valor!».
languages.original_text: {n}Argenta's expression brightens.{/n} "Countless foes and a cumbersome position. O Emperor, I thank Thee for giving us another chance to taste the sweetness of battle and the solemn joy of courageous deeds!"

traits.locale_text: {n}El rostro de Argenta se ilumina.{/n} «Enemigos sin fin y una posición espantosa. ¡Oh, Emperador, te agradezco que nos hayas dado otra oportunidad de disfrutar del fragor de la batalla y de la solemne alegría del valor!».

languages.text: {n}阿洁塔露出了喜悦的表情。{/n}“敌人为数众多，但并没有战术优势。帝皇，我感谢你再次赐予我们这个机会，让我们再次品尝到战斗的甜美，以及勇敢作战的庄严喜悦！”
languages.original_text: {n}Argenta's expression brightens.{/n} "Countless foes and a cumbersome position. O Emperor, I thank Thee for giving us another chance to taste the sweetness of battle and the solemn joy of courageous deeds!"

traits.locale_text: {n}阿洁塔露出了喜悦的表情。{/n}“敌人为数众多，但并没有战术优势。帝皇，我感谢你再次赐予我们这个机会，让我们再次品尝到战斗的甜美，以及勇敢作战的庄严喜悦！”

languages.text: {n}アルジェンタの表情が明るくなる。{/n}「無数の敵と面倒な立ち位置。皇帝よ、甘美な戦闘と、勇気ある行いのズシっとくる喜びを味わえるチャンスを、いま一度与えてくださり感謝します！」
languages.original_text: {n}Argenta's expression brightens.{/n} "Countless foes and a cumbersome position. O Emperor, I thank Thee for giving us another chance to taste the sweetness of battle and the solemn joy of courageous deeds!"

traits.locale_text: {n}アルジェンタの表情が明るくなる。{/n}「無数の敵と面倒な立ち位置。皇帝よ、甘美な戦闘と、勇気ある行いのズシっとくる喜びを味わえるチャンスを、いま一度与えてくださり感謝します！」

languages.text: {n}Argentas Ausdruck hellt sich auf.{/n} "Unzählige Gegner und eine ungünstige Stellung O Imperator, ich danke Euch für diese neue Chance, die Süße der Schlacht und die gefasste Freude mutiger Taten zu erleben!"
languages.original_text: {n}Argenta's expression brightens.{/n} "Countless foes and a cumbersome position. O Emperor, I thank Thee for giving us another chance to taste the sweetness of battle and the solemn joy of courageous deeds!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Argentas Ausdruck hellt sich auf.{/n} "Unzählige Gegner und eine ungünstige Stellung O Imperator, ich danke Euch für diese neue Chance, die Süße der Schlacht und die gefasste Freude mutiger Taten zu erleben!"

languages.text: {n}Le visage d'Argenta s'illumine.{/n} « D'innombrables ennemis et une position désavantageuse. Ô Empereur, je Vous remercie de nous offrir une nouvelle chance de savourer l'ardeur du combat et la joie solennelle des actes de courage ! »
languages.original_text: {n}Argenta's expression brightens.{/n} "Countless foes and a cumbersome position. O Emperor, I thank Thee for giving us another chance to taste the sweetness of battle and the solemn joy of courageous deeds!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Le visage d'Argenta s'illumine.{/n} « D'innombrables ennemis et une position désavantageuse. Ô Empereur, je Vous remercie de nous offrir une nouvelle chance de savourer l'ardeur du combat et la joie solennelle des actes de courage ! »

languages.text: {n}Argenta'nın yüzü aydınlanıyor.{/n} "Sayısız düşman ve dezavantajlı bir mevki. Yüce İmparator'umuz, bize savaşın doyulmaz tadını alma imkânını ve gözü pek eylemlerde bulunmanın tarifsiz mutluluğunu yeniden deneyimleme şansını bahşettiğin için minnettarım!"
languages.original_text: {n}Argenta's expression brightens.{/n} "Countless foes and a cumbersome position. O Emperor, I thank Thee for giving us another chance to taste the sweetness of battle and the solemn joy of courageous deeds!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Argenta'nın yüzü aydınlanıyor.{/n} "Sayısız düşman ve dezavantajlı bir mevki. Yüce İmparator'umuz, bize savaşın doyulmaz tadını alma imkânını ve gözü pek eylemlerde bulunmanın tarifsiz mutluluğunu yeniden deneyimleme şansını bahşettiğin için minnettarım!"
